summary: Build an exact replica of the Silverstone Industries reference website for a micronised mineral contract manufacturer, changing the color scheme to green and white, with static informational pages, images/visual assets matching the reference layout, and client-edited business details (names/contact/address).

existing_features.title: Static multi-page marketing website replica (green/white theme)
existing_features.description: Implements a static informational website closely modeled on the provided Silverstone Industries reference layout, using a green/white color scheme and a shared header/footer layout.

existing_features.title: Core pages implemented (Home, About, Services, Industries, Contact, 404)
existing_features.description: Adds routed static pages for Home, About, Services, Industries, and Contact, plus a NotFound (404) page, wired via a central routes config.

existing_features.title: Client-editable site content configuration
existing_features.description: Centralizes business/contact/address and other editable copy into a site content/config module so client-specific details can be updated without changing page layouts.

existing_features.title: Replacement visual assets added (generated/licensed equivalents matching reference layout)
existing_features.description: Adds replacement images (AI-generated/royalty-free equivalents) to mirror the Silverstone reference layout, wired through a centralized siteImages module and used across core pages while respecting licensing/IP constraints.

existing_features.title: Additional AI/processed replacement images generated and integrated for remaining site slots
existing_features.description: Adds and wires additional generated/processed images in frontend/public/assets/generated (including a quartz-lumps hero replacement and a services mineral-powder image) to complete the remaining visual slots while matching the reference layout and respecting IP constraints.

existing_features.title: Update the centralized site content so the production-per-year value is changed from “24000 MT” to “6000 MT”, and ensure the updated value appears everywhere it is rendered (e.g., Home stats section and About page text/stats).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add/replace the About Us page image (generate or provide a properly-licensed equivalent matching the reference layout)
Integrate uploaded images img9.jpg and img11.jpg into the Services page (use as-is, matching the reference layout)
Update the website’s company name, contact details, and address (client-provided) in the centralized site content/config so pages display the correct business information
Change the Home (front) page “Welcome to” text color to white (match desired styling)

architectural_notes: Reference website URL provided for replication: https://www.silverstoneindustries.com/
Target: exact visual/design/layout replica of https://www.silverstoneindustries.com/ with color scheme changed to green and white.
Content approach: client will edit names, contact details, personal information, and address (avoid copying those verbatim).
Scope: static informational pages only (no interactive features/forms requested).
Frontend implemented in React + Vite with Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui components.
Site uses a shared layout component (Header/Footer) with route-based pages and a central siteRoutes configuration.
Client-editable copy/details are centralized in a siteContent/config module for easy updates.
Images/visual assets should mirror the reference layout; use client-provided or properly licensed images rather than copying proprietary assets from the reference site.
Do not copy/download and reuse proprietary images from the Silverstone reference site; use client-provided assets or properly licensed/AI-generated/royalty-free equivalents that match the layout.

Decision: use similar replacement images (AI-generated/royalty-free/properly licensed) that match the Silverstone reference layout; do not reuse Silverstone's proprietary images unless permission is provided.
known_issues: About Us image selection clarified to img2-1.jpg, but placement is still unconfirmed (hero vs secondary/content slot).
